EmailTemplate.name: Need 1st Used Dates
EmailTemplate.subject: Need 1st Used Dates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You indicated on your application that you are currently using your trademark in commerce. To file your application on a ?use in commerce? basis, you must show proof that you have used the mark in the ordinary course of trade and are not simply reserving rights in the mark.
In order to proceed with your trademark application, you must provide the following:
1. Date of first use anywhere ? month and year 2. Date of first use in commerce ? month and year
Your use-based application will include your sworn statement, the dates you provide above, and a specimen or example of your use of the mark in commerce. NOTE: Dates in the future may not be used. The USPTO requires the trademark be used in commerce prior to the submission of your application.
Please call or email us as soon as possible to provide your information at (800) 773-0888 Monday?Friday from 6 a.m.?7p.m. PT or customercare@legalzoom.com.
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
